name: Get Me Out (Futuregames)
description:
You’ve been stuck on a ship alone after the AI of the ship went rogue and decided to keep you as its companion and lab rat. As the days pile on they don't seem to have an intention of letting you go. 

But before all hope is lost you are contacted by a search party on a space station ready to help you override the safety measures set by the AI on the ship and help you escape. The AI is not happy about this and intends to self-destruct the ship with YOU in it. Team up with a friend in this puzzle game that will test your ability to communicate and problem-solve with others under time pressure. 

Prove that you have what it takes to escape safely and live another day. Choose who will be the “Crewmate” stuck in the ship and who will hold the responsibility of being the “Engineer” Helping the crewmate not get blown up to bits. While the Crewmate navigates, explores, and relays information, the Engineer processes the information, Manages instructions, and relays execution commands for the Crewmate. All of this while in zero gravity! 

The entire game can be played with no internet connection, the only requirements are having a way to speak to each other but not look at each other’s screens. However, both players must have the game in order to play together
